Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year! From one farmer to another, I
hope the coming year will be a fruitful one for all
of us! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
H.N.Y.H.I.H.A.H! ...Hm? What the heck did I just
say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What, isn't it obvious? It's the abbreviation for
Happy New Year Hope It's Happy And Healthy!
Duh!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wait, explaining it made me spell the entire thing
out, which defeats the whole point! Dangit, I
just don't get acronyms.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>! Let's resolve to
make this year even more filled with warmth,
love and cuddles than last year. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year! Man, I'm so glad I got to spend
New Year's with you, <MYNAME>. It was a blast!
<PAGE>
Let's do lots more stuff together this year, like
going on dates, or maybe going on more dates.
Heh heh heh. Variety is the spice of life! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, Happy New Year! Here's to another
great year together, and another one after that,
and...pretty much all the years to come!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year! Here's to another year with you
by my side, laughing and smiling, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh heh. As long as you're with me, I feel like
I'm invincible! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmm-mmm! Those buckwheat noodles were
good. I'm stuffed!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Though, maybe goin' back for fourths wasn't the
best idea. I feel like my stomach's about ready to
burst...urp!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's weird. Just knowing it's a new year makes
me feel really motivated. I think I could do just
about anything right now! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aah, <MYNAME>. A Happy New Year to you.
May we all spend it in happiness and health.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. I pray we'll have a surplus of
prosperity and a dearth of ill health and
misfortune.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year--wait a moment. <MYNAME>,
you have a bit of noodle clinging to the side of
your mouth.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We're barely into the new year, and already
you've made a case for yourself as a loveable
glutton. There. It's clean, now.
<PAGE>
With you by my side, I think this will be another
entertaining year. I can hardly wait.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I wonder...how
much deeper will our relationship grow over this
coming year? I'm looking forward to finding out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hm? You think we already have a deep
relationship? Oh, you're still so young...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. May it be a bright and healthy
one.
<PAGE>
Hm? Now that we're married and will be
spending the rest of our lives together, you think
that sounds too stiff and formal?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Perhaps in our case, we should instead say "may
we embrace the future in happiness and health
for years to come."

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope you will
continue to stay by my side, that stalwart smile
upon your face.
<PAGE>
If you do, I'm sure I will be able to overcome any
challenge this year may throw my way.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an enormous cauldron. Bringing that thing
here must have been a chore. We owe some
thanks to the Sakura Country merchants.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The "auspicious first dream" of a year is usually
one that you have on the night of New Year's
Day.
<PAGE>
Though recently, more people have begun to say
it's the dream one has the night of New Year's
Eve.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah well. It isn't as if there is a "correct" answer,
so feel free to choose whichever night gives you
the better dream.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. Here's hoping we
all have a good run of it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. I'll be fixing up lots of good
food at my restaurant again this year, so stop on
by, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. I'm glad I got the chance to
spend tonight with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Say, uh...I was just thinking, this coming year,
I'd like to spend more time together.
<PAGE>
So, er...I'd be really happy if you'd set aside
more time for us to, y'know, go on more dates
and all.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
My resolution for this year is...I guess you could
say it's getting closer with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What, you think we're close enough? Oh, not
nearly. If you like what we've got now, I think
you'll love what I've got in store.
<PAGE>
Me, I'm not satisfied with just maintaining the
status quo. This year, I want us to turn our spark
into some real fire. So be ready, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. May we have
plenty of happy and healthy ones in our future.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? What about this year? Well, we're going to
be together for years and years to come, y'know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So I wanted to make sure I covered not just this
year, but all of those years in the future, too.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. Stick by me again
this year and keep on smiling, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The buckwheat noodles were excellent. Noodles
made right, straight from the source. I learned a
lot just from tasting them.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's kind of weird, when you think about it -- all
these people making such a big deal of moving
one day forward.
<PAGE>
It's been pretty fun watching everybody get so
excited about it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. Both my sister and I extend our
wishes for your happiness and good health in
the new year.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Hm? Resolutions? Let's see...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>How about I resolve to increase your awareness
of my Antique Shop, and your interest in my
wares?
<PAGE>
I will make sure to stock several items I am
certain you will enjoy, so please feel free to stop
by and browse.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year. May we spend this year in
comfort and peace, and may you continue to
have eyes only for me.
<PAGE>
As ever, you will be the sole focus of my
affections.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. I hope this year will see the
two of us grow even closer together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, you think we're already quite close? Heh
heh. The adorable things you say.
<PAGE>
However, this is me you are dealing with, and
the well of my affection is deep indeed. I can
hardly wait to see where we are in a year's time.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
May the coming year...no. May this year and all
the years that are to come be filled with
happiness for both of us.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. I hope this year, too, will find
you standing steadfast by my side.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone seems quite energetic and awake,
despite the late hour.
<PAGE>
We're barely into the new year, and there is
already an all-night party. I hope at least a few of
us will be able to wake up on time tomorrow.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems even the people of Sakura Country are
divided on the origin of the custom of eating
buckwheat noodles for New Year's.
<PAGE>
Come to think of it, what did we have to eat for
New Year's before Sakura Country began the
tradition of gifting us with the noodles?
<PAGE>
By the time I participated in these festivities
regularly, I think the noodles had already become
our town's standard dish...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. Hey, <MYNAME>. Happy New Year. You sure
look peppy, even though it's really late.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I'm not one for moldy old formal
greetings. You'll get a "Happy New Year" out of
me and that's about it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year...whoa. Hold on. There's a
piece of noodle stuck to your chin.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>No, to the right. Your other right! Lower, no,
lower... Augh! Enough, just let me get it! Now
hold still.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>There. Got it. Hn? Why are you blushing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What's wrong with me eating that piece? It's not
like there's a trash can here, and I'm not gonna
throw it on the ground.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I get it. You wanted to have that piece, but I
stole it from you? Geez, you really don't let food
go to waste.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year.
Er...I...uh...AHEM...mumblemumblemumble...
<PAGE>
...Okay! Okay! I said I'm glad I got to spend
tonight with you! Geez!
<PAGE>
Quit makin' me repeat all that mushy stuff!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I had a lot of fun
bein' with you last year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope this year...wait, no, I guess I could say
every year now...will be even more fun than the
one before.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. I hope you'll stick with me
again this year, smiling that big, easygoing smile
of yours all the time.
<PAGE>
Because if you don't, then I'll feel depressed too.
So keep on keepin' on, all right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This was a fun New Year's festival. And loud. I
ate so many bowls of noodles I was ready to
doze off, but all the shouting kept me up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Back in my home country, we don't have any
festivals for celebrating the New Year together
with everybody.
<PAGE>
Still, it seems like there are more places that get
together than places that don't. Like this town,
for example.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I've gotta admit, it's kinda nice to get everyone
together for a party like this every once in a
while.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. Here's to it being
a happy and healthy one!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. Happy New Year.
<PAGE>
Since you've lived here longer than me, I hope
you can teach me even more about the town in
the coming year.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year. I'm really glad we got to spend
this festival together, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope this coming year will be just as great as
the last.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year! ...hm? Oh, hold on. You have
a piece of noodle stuck to your chin.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>There, got it. Haha! You know, <MYNAME>,
sometimes you act like an adorable little kitten.
<PAGE>
The way you slurp-munched your noodles just a
little bit ago was really cute, too
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er...sorry. I know it's kind of weird to stare at
people while they're eating and all...
<PAGE>
But I just couldn't stop myself from glancing
over at you and er...boy, I've really dug myself
into a hole this time, haven't I?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. May it bring us happiness,
health, great fashion, and all that good stuff.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You know, now that we're married, it feels a little
odd to talk about just the next year, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hmm. Maybe I'll say "I hope we have happiness
and health forever" instead. Yeah. That seems to
cover everything handily.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope you'll keep
stickin' with me through thick and thin, through
good hair days and bad.
<PAGE>
Seeing you smile makes me feel like I can handle
whatever life throws at me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a brand new year, but that doesn't mean
things are suddenly going to change right away.
Right now feels just like the old year.
<PAGE>
But in a year's time, things will have changed,
for better or worse. I've gotta remember to have
fun along the way.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right after the New Year, a whole year feels like
a long time. But at the next New Year's party, I
think "Where did that year go?"
<PAGE>
How was your last year, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
For me, it was a good year. I made slow but
steady progress toward realizing my dream.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. May it be a lovely one for you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. A Happy New Year to
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>From one farmer to another, I look forward to
giving you a hearty challenge once again. I won't
be bested easily, so be ready. ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year... Oh my, wait just a moment.
You have a piece of noodle stuck to your chin,
<MYNAME>. Hpmh, were you raised in a barn?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>No, not there. More to your right. Your other
right! Oh, you are just impossible sometimes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>There. All clean! Honestly, you can be such a
child at times. The new year has hardly begun,
and already you have me fussing over you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope this year
will see us grow even closer together as a
couple.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But just to be certain you know, I will tolerate no
fooling around. None!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>This coming year...and for all the many years to
come, I want you looking at me, and only me.
No one else.
<PAGE>
Do you understand?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. Thanks to you,
there has scarcely been a dull moment this past
year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I look forward to spending this next year...well,
if I'm honest, all the years to come... Anyway, I
look forward to spending them with you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. Let us spend this year side by
side, with you smiling in that warm way that
puts me so at ease.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Because if you don't, then even I may begin to
feel out of sorts. So...please keep that happy
smile, all right?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is not unusual for several people to share a
meal from a single serving bowl...
<PAGE>
But an entire town sharing noodles from that
enormous cauldron? I had never done anything
like it before coming here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I was hesitant at first, of course, but now that I
am accustomed to it, it's actually rather fun.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Spending the evening together with everyone like
this makes it very easy to lose track of time.
That will never do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Father always says that those who would be in
charge of others must never be careless with
their time.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope it's a
happy and healthy one for you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. I must admit, I've been having
a tough time finding good ideas for novels lately,
so I hope this year is an exciting one.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you come across anything you think might
make an interesting story, please let me know.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I wonder what
fascinating new story ideas I'll get from you this
year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! Even if you don't tell me any, simply
being with you is already a wellspring of ideas
for torrid romance novellas!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It's always said one should write what they
know, and...I really am in love.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I wonder, what
will our relationship be like at this time next
year?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! You think we're already close? Being
sweethearts is just the first step. You mustn't be
satisfied with just that!
<PAGE>
As we become more serious, we're allowed to
be ever-so-slightly more selfish. Love lights that
fire in us.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. Thanks to you, this past year
has been nothing if not entertaining.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope this coming year...and really, every year
thereafter, we'll enjoy health, happiness, and
love.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope we'll stand
strong and seize the day together all year long.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you made your New Year's resolutions yet?
<PAGE>
The year's barely begun, so I'm sure you'll have
time to think of a few. Most good resolutions
take some thought, anyway.
<PAGE>
But don't ponder forever, or you'll miss out on
living life while you're trying to plan it all out.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's still the beginning of a brand new year, and I
understand why everyone would like to stay up
all night long...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>However, a lady must take care of herself, and
staying up late isn't good for the skin, so I think
I'll head off to bed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now that I think about it...your skin has a
radiant, healthy glow. I wonder if mine did when
I was your age...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hi <MYNAME>! Happy New Year! I hope
yours is off to a great start!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I hope we'll keep getting along great this coming
year. I'm looking forward to it!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Eep!! <MYNAME>! Um, H-h-happy New Year! I-I
hope it's a good one for, um, b-both of us
together!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Um, H-happy New Year! Wha? Do I have any
resolutions?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I-I guess I want to get better at looking you in
the eye and, um, talking to you coherently...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Er, n-nothing! I didn't say anything! Ummmm
resolutions? To uh, to do better at work, I
guess.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. Thanks to you,
this last year was a lot of fun.
<PAGE>
I hope this new year -- well, next year too...oh,
and all the years after that! -- are full of
happiness and good times.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I think I can take
on anything this year, as long as you're with me.
<PAGE>
When I see you smile at me, I feel all charged
up, like a battery at full capacity.
<PAGE>
So if you're there for me, I know I can overcome
any challenge this new year could throw at me!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's so much fun hanging out with everyone and
celebrating the new year together.
<PAGE>
And this year, everybody was here, too. Nobody
had work, or was too sick to come.
<PAGE>
I hope next year we can all get together like this
and ring in the new year again.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year, I'm gonna try to trust my own abilities
more so I can branch out even more with my
job.
<PAGE>
Of course, my main job will still be doing the
weather reports, but I'd like to try even more
things on TV!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. May it bring us
health, wealth and wisdom! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year! I hope you'll keep being a great
friend to me and all the animals this year.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year! Hm? Oh dear. You have a piece
of noodle stuck to your chin, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Here, let me get it. There. All clean! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD><MYNAME>, what's wrong? You've turned really
red all of a sudden! Do you have a fever?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? Because I ate that piece of noodle?
Umm...was there something wrong with that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh, did you want to eat it instead? I'm sorry, I
didn't even think that you might want it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I'm really, really
happy I got to spend this last year with you. ♪
<PAGE>
Let's go on lots and lots more dates this year,
okay? Heehee! I can't wait. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>! Let's resolve to
make this year even more full of love and life
than last year! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>! ♪ I hope this
year'll give you lots of reasons to smile.
<PAGE>
After all, when you're happy, I can't help but feel
happy.
<PAGE>
And when you're sad, then I feel all mopey, too.
Since we're married now, our hearts are one,
you know. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh look! A shooting star!
<PAGE>
Seeing a shooting star right at the beginning of a
new year has to be really lucky! I'm sure this year
is going to be a wonderful one!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My resolution is to make friends with even more
animals this year. ♪
<PAGE>
What's your New Year's resolution, <MYNAME>?
To be the best farmer in the world?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Both my mother and I wish you the happiest and
healthiest of new years.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Just because it is a new year does not mean you
should overdo it with your resolutions. I hope
you will have a healthy and safe new year.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year. I, er, hope that this coming
year will see us, ah...grow closer as a couple.
<PAGE>
I am sure there are areas in which I could stand
to improve, but I hope you will bear with me. I
am looking forward to being with you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. I am very glad I was able to
spend this evening ringing in the new year with
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Though I was hoping for, er...a little more
personal time for the two of us to spend
together.
<PAGE>
But I mustn't be selfish like that. It isn't polite.
<PAGE>
Strangely, the more time I spend with you, the
more selfish I become about you. That will never
do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I suppose I might as well make my New Year's
resolution to improve my self-discipline.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope this year -- and to be more precise, every
year hereafter -- will be filled with joy and
warmth for us.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope that in the years to come, you'll be at my
side, smiling like you always have.
<PAGE>
If you do, then no matter what challenges come
my way, I am sure I can surmount them.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whew...Now that the new year is here, I
suddenly feel very sleepy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess I may have had a little too much fun
tonight. I think I shall go straight to bed once I'm
home.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I think the New Year's festival is a wonderful one
that brings the whole town together and fosters
a sense of community. Don't you agree?
<PAGE>
I especially like the moment where everyone is
counting down the final seconds to the new
year together.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. Happy New Year. I hope
everything'll go smoothly for you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year. You know, my resolution this
year is to spend even more time hittin' the
books, and more time studying plants.
<PAGE>
I may be stopping by your farm more often, so I
hope you're looking forward to seeing plenty of
me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I hope that this
year, er...w-we can, ah, grow closer together as
a couple.
<PAGE>
I'm sure there'll be lots of things I could do
better, but as your s-s-sweetheart, I'm, er, really
looking forward to another year together.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Happy New Year. I'm glad I got to spend tonight
ringing in the new year with you.
<PAGE>
I'm, er...looking forward to spending this year
with you. And a lot of years after this one, too.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy New Year. You know, whenever I spend
